TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void QueryCursorEventHandler(object sender, QueryCursorEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed QueryCursorEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub QueryCursorEventHandler(sender As Object, e As QueryCursorEventArgs)
public delegate void QueryCursorEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, QueryCursorEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示將處理 和 事件以及 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events, as well as the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會使用與下列附加事件。This delegate is used with the following attached events. - 這個委派會使用與下列路由事件。This delegate is used with the following routed events. 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
